description:
Shuusuke sneaks out in the dead of night to pick up a naughty magazine, but on the way home he bumps into a mysterious person wearing a hood. Shuusuke apologizes to the person and quickly rushes home to enjoy his new treasure... but finds his new treasure has changed into a boy`s love magazine instead of the magazine he bought. He realizes he must have accidentally swapped packages when he bumped into the mysterious person, so he tears the magazine to pieces in protest. Meanwhile the mysterious hooded character is just as upset that the boy`s love magazine has been replaced by cute girls in naughty clothes...
The next day, Shuusuke finds a blackmail message inside his shoe locker from someone named `Mister X`. It seems Mister X is the mysterious person he bumped into... and he wants to meet with him and exchange magazines. Shuusuke panics when he realizes that he already ripped up the boy`s love magazine, and in his panic he bumps into the student council president - Mayuka... which also lets him get a nice look at her black stockings and panties...
